channel.title: Dadmother - No Windows, No Doors, No Light, No More
channel.description: This is the product of a nasty mixture of pain, anxiety, and depression. This is not meant to be a “pretty” song. It’s abrasive, cacophonous, and generally ugly. It is meant to convey a feeling, and helped to serve as a bit of a release for a lot of negativity in my head at the time. Depression is a never-ending battle, one that is most certainly not a “pretty” one. I wish for the safety and comfort to all who deal with depression. [No Windows, No Doors, No Light, No More](https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/no-windows-no-doors-no-lights) ![image|500x500](upload://50GsGX5ex0vo3lz0FrS5HfbCbMF.jpeg)
